title: Woman charged after ricochet bullet strikes 8-year-old
content:
PANAMA CITY, Fla.
An 8-year-old had a close call Sunday when a bullet ricocheted off a brick wall and struck her in the shoulder.
According to a Panama City Police report Rachel Hinson was arguing with another woman in a white Cadillac in the Macedonia Garden Apartment complex Sunday when she fired a gun. The bullet missed her intended target blasted through the driver's side window and eventually struck the child in her shoulder.
Hinson left the area but was tracked down thanks to witnesses on scene and charged with discharging a firearm in public, two counts of tampering with evidence and two counts of aggravated assault.
The child suffered minor injuries.
Hinson has been released from jail on a $30,000 bond.
